Latest News

Welcome to LFCDenver.com

23 Feb 2016

Welcome to the new website! Since Facebook is making it more difficult to reach everyone without paying for it, we’re going to start to do more updates here. We’ll still have posts and interaction on all of our social media platforms, but this will be the central location for all of our activity.

  • More

Steven Gerrard is Back!

23 Feb 2016

Steven Gerrard and the LA Galaxy will be in town to take on the Colorado Rapids on Saturday March 13. The Rapids have been kind enough to set aside tickets in Section 103 for any LFC Denver supporters who would like to attend what is likely one of Stevie’s final matches in Denver.

  • More

About LFC Denver

Formed in January 2011 as the Colorado Reds, LFC Denver became an Official Liverpool Supporters Club in 2013. Our goal is to provide local and visiting Liverpool FC fans an enjoyable and welcoming environment to come support our favorite football club.

The Abbey Tavern

LFC Denver's home pub since 2014, the Abbey Tavern is owned and run by Liverpool supporters and is open for every televised Liverpool match.
